newsitem.title: USA: Merisel says Rittenmeyer to leave Co.
newsitem.headline: Merisel says Rittenmeyer to leave Co.

text.p: Merisel Inc said Wednesday Ronald Rittenmeyer will resign as president and chief operating officer, effective October 1.
Dwight Steffensen, Merisel's chief executive, will assume Rittenmeyer's duties at that time, the company said.
Merisel said the sale of its European, Latin American and Mexican operations, as announced on August 30, "will diminish the need for two senior level executives."
"Dwight and I both realized that the remaining North American businesses would require only one of us in a senior level executive position," Rittenmeyer said in a statement.
